distinct_id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

browser.description: The type of browser used by the user.

browser_version.description: The version of the browser used by the user.

city.description: The city where the user is located.

country_code.description: The country code of the user's location.

region.description: The region where the user is located.

timezone.description: The timezone of the user's location.

last_seen.description: The date and time when the user was last seen.

email.description: The email address of the user.

name.description: The full name of the user.

first_name.description: The first name of the user.

last_name.description: The last name of the user.

id.description: The unique ID associated with the user.

unblocked.description: Indicates whether the user is unblocked or not.
